Package info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.dao

Interface AppointmentDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppointmentDaoImpl
    public interface AppointmentDao
    Allows predictable access to persistent Appointment data.

      • getAll

        java.util.List<Appointment> getAll()
        Gets a java.util.List of all Appointments.
        Returns:
        All Appointments

      • getByStartDateTimeWindow

        java.util.List<Appointment> getByStartDateTimeWindow​(java.time.ZonedDateTime start,
                                                     java.time.ZonedDateTime end)
        Gets a java.util.List of all Appointments that start within the given date and time window.
        Parameters:
        start - Start date and time of window to filter by
        end - End date and time of window to filter by
        Returns:
        All Appointments that start within the given date and time window

      • getByCustomerIdAndDateTimeWindow

        java.util.List<Appointment> getByCustomerIdAndDateTimeWindow​(int customerId,
                                                             java.time.ZonedDateTime start,
                                                             java.time.ZonedDateTime end)
        Gets a java.util.List of all Appointments for a specific Customer that start, stop, or are ongoing within the given date and time window.
        Parameters:
        customerId - Unique identifier for Customer to filter by
        start - Start date and time of window to filter by
        end - End date and time of window to filter by
        Returns:
        All Appointments for the Customer that fall within the given date and time window

      • getById

        Appointment getById​(int id)
        Gets a specific Appointment based on their unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - Unique identifier for Appointment
        Returns:
        Appointment associated with identifier if any

      • create

        int create​(Appointment appointment)
        Creates a new Appointment record.
        Parameters:
        appointment - New Appointment data to store
        Returns:
        1 or 0 to indicate number of records created

      • update

        int update​(Appointment appointment)
        Updates an existing Appointment record.
        Parameters:
        appointment - Updated Appointment data to store
        Returns:
        1 or 0 to indicate number of records updated

        Deletes an existing Appointment record.
        Parameters:
        id - Unique identifier of Appointment to delete
        Returns:
        1 or 0 to indicate number of records deleted

      • deleteByCustomerId

        int deleteByCustomerId​(int customerId)
        Deletes any existing Appointment records for a specific Customer.
        Parameters:
        customerId - Unique identifier of Customer to delete Appointments for
        Returns:
        0+ to indicate number of records deleted
